Title: Bottom Bitch
Plot: A prostitute seeks the help of the police in her quest to bring down her pimp.  Claudette assigns Vic against his wishes to the case, which puts him on the verge of going over the edge.  Dutch uncovers a disturbing trend of rapes and a politician is arrested for solicitation.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,sexual violence and offensive language
GuestStars: David Rees Snell, Cathy Cahlin Ryan, Brian J. White, Michele Hicks, Brent Sexton, Mageina Tovah, Efrain Figueroa, Nicki Micheaux, Gareth Williams, Jeanette Miller
